title: Add 'Our Work' gallery section to landing page

requirements.text: Create a new landing-page section component for an "Our Work" gallery (image card grid) and add it to the landing page flow so it renders between existing sections (place it after ServicesSection and before CoverageSection).

quotes: અમારા કામની ઝલક (Our Work)

acceptanceCriteria: A new React component exists under the existing landing components folder (frontend/src/components/landing/...) for the gallery section.
LandingPage includes the new gallery section after ServicesSection and before CoverageSection.
No changes are made to files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths.

requirements.text: Implement the "Our Work" gallery UI to match the provided layout intent: section heading and subtitle, followed by a responsive grid (1 column on mobile, 2 on small screens, 3 on large screens) of image cards with rounded corners, subtle border, shadow, and hover animations (image zoom + card shadow increase). Use English for the visible heading/subtitle and card titles/descriptions.

quotes: પ્રોફેશનલ ઇન્ડોર અને આઉટડોર એસી ક્લીનિંગ

acceptanceCriteria: The section displays a heading "Our Work" and a subtitle "Professional indoor and outdoor AC cleaning" (or equivalent English phrasing).
The gallery grid is responsive with breakpoints equivalent to grid-cols-1 / sm:grid-cols-2 / lg:grid-cols-3.
Each card includes an image, an English title, and (if included) a short English caption; images have meaningful alt text.
Hovering a card increases its shadow and slightly scales the image (no layout shift).

requirements.text: Seed the gallery with at least 3 items, including the provided Unsplash image URL for one of the cards, and ensure images are sized/cropped consistently (e.g., fixed height with object-cover).
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 gallery items render by default.
One item uses the exact provided image URL.
All images display with consistent dimensions/cropping (e.g., same height and object-cover).

constraints: Frontend must remain React + TypeScript + Tailwind and compose shadcn/ui components without editing sources under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not introduce any new backend canister methods for this gallery (static content only).
nonGoals: Image upload/admin management for gallery items
Lightbox/modal viewer, carousel, or full gallery routing
